/pages/kratom-teas.notes: Single product with size variants only. All customizations (strain, flavors, ice, sweetness) are line item properties.

/pages/canned-drinks.notes: Smart collection automatically includes all products matching rules. Force-include specific GIDs if needed.

/pages/draft-pours.notes: Tap metaobjects manage 8 active taps with keg tracking. Excludes BBCO/Botanical Brewing products. Inventory decrements on orders/paid webhook.

/pages/kava-drinks.notes: Smart collection for kava products. Collection already exists (handle was taken during creation attempt).

/pages/thc-drinks.notes: Smart collection for THC drink products (excludes shots).

/pages/thc-shots.notes: Smart collection for THC shot products (2oz variants). Mirrors THC Drinks but shows only 2oz variants.

implementation_notes.kratom_teas: Page uses existing custom-kratom-tea-builder.liquid section with wtf-kratom.js. Variants = size only. Line item properties = strain, flavors, ice, sweetness, notes.
implementation_notes.canned_drinks: Wire page to render collection using collection-on-page.liquid section or existing product grid.
implementation_notes.draft_pours: Create tap-grid.liquid section to fetch tap metaobjects where active=true, ordered by display_order. Show 8 cards with 'Add 16oz' and 'Add Flight' buttons.
implementation_notes.kava_drinks: Wire page to render kava-drinks collection with product cards.
implementation_notes.thc_drinks: Wire page to render thc-drinks collection with product cards.
implementation_notes.thc_shots: Wire page to render thc-shots collection, optionally filtering to show only 2oz variants.
